scripts.test-chrome: yarn playwright-install && npx playwright test tests/ui --project chromium
scripts.test-firefox: yarn playwright-install && npx playwright test tests/ui --project firefox
scripts.test-all: yarn clear && yarn npm-run-all -p -c test-chrome test-api
scripts.allure-report: allure generate allure-results -o allure-report --clean && allure open allure-report
